nodes.excerpt: No need to hire AI developers or specialists to introduce new technology and diversify your business. CLICK AI allows anyone to create deep learning-based AI models fast, with high accuracy, and without limitation by AI type/industry group.

nodes.excerpt: Shopping online can be hard and expensive. Closet AI lets you upload a photo of a clothing item from the internet or your own closet and quickly uses AI to build an outfit that matches your item based on 100,000+ items, 100+ brands and your price range! 🚀

nodes.excerpt: Sherlock is a free Chrome plugin that analyzes price trends, permit history, sale history, demographics, quality of life, healthcare access, and more for every home on sale on Zillow and Redfin.

localize.description: Sherlock是一款免费的Chrome插件，它可以分析Zillow和Redfin上每一栋在售房屋的价格趋势、许可历史、销售历史、人口统计、生活质量、医疗服务等。

nodes.excerpt: Draftshot is an app that predicts how popular your shots might be before you upload it on Dribbble. Whether it's a logo, web design or illustration, it doesn't matter. Draftshot uses machine learning to predict popularity of any design.
nodes.title: Draftshot for Dribbble - Predict how popular your shot might be on Dribbble
nodes.author: Vladislav Len

localize.description: Draftshot是一款应用，它可以在你上传到Dribbble之前就预测你的镜头可能会有多受欢迎。无论是logo、网页设计还是插画，都不在话下。Draftshot使用机器学习来预测任何设计的受欢迎程度。
localize.tagline: 预测你的投篮在Dribbble上的受欢迎程度。

localize.description: Draftshot是一款應用，它可以在你上傳到Dribbble之前就預測你的鏡頭可能會有多受歡迎。無論是logo、網頁設計還是插畫，都不在話下。Draftshot使用機器學習來預測任何設計的受歡迎程度。
localize.tagline: 預測你的投籃在Dribbble上的受歡迎程度。

nodes.excerpt: Pageturner is a free community for readers and people building their reading habit. Reading in public and sharing your notes lets you discover interesting ideas and keeps you accountable.

localize.description: Pageturner是一个免费的社区，为读者和人们建立他们的阅读习惯。公开阅读和分享你的笔记，让你发现有趣的想法，并让你负责任。
localize.tagline: 让我们一起养成阅读的习惯吧

nodes.excerpt: Writing your negative thoughts down on a piece of paper and then discarding them can help you find peace. Thought Detox brings this experience to your iPhone, letting you write out your thoughts and then release them — without storing or sending them anywhere.
nodes.title: Thought Detox - Private notes to clear your mind
nodes.author: Angelo Stavrow

localize.description: 将你的负面想法写在纸上，然后丢弃，可以帮助你找到平静。Thought Detox将这种体验带到你的iPhone上，让你写出你的想法，然后释放它们--无需存储或发送它们到任何地方。
localize.tagline: 私人笔记，让你头脑清醒

localize.description: 將你的負面想法寫在紙上，然後丟棄，可以幫助你找到平靜。Thought Detox將這種體驗帶到你的iPhone上，讓你寫出你的想法，然後釋放它們--無需存儲或發送它們到任何地方。
localize.tagline: 私人筆記，讓你頭腦清醒

nodes.excerpt: Rent the Backyard builds backyard homes for people to house their family, use as a home office or rent for extra income. The process is as fast as 12 weeks, (2 weeks in your backyard). Eco-friendly tech & software lets us build up to 40% cheaper & 2x as fast.

nodes.excerpt: You've been working on your project for months. You finally finished the product and now you need a name. You're exhausted from brainstorming and struggling to find a good domain. That's why we sell brandable domains with logos ready to go!
nodes.title: IndieBrands - Original domain names and logos for your startup
nodes.author: Laurids

localize.description: 你已经在你的项目上工作了几个月。你终于完成了产品，现在你需要一个名字。你从头脑风暴中筋疲力尽，努力寻找一个好的域名。这就是为什么我们出售带有标识的品牌域名，随时可以使用!
localize.tagline: 为您的初创企业提供原创域名和标识。

nodes.excerpt: Email clients like Gmail have intelligent algorithms & know your email sending history. When you make an email marketing mistake they put you in the SPAM Jail. To come out you need to establish good sender reputation & WarmupYourEmail helps you do that.
nodes.title: Warmup Your Email - Always land in Inbox by establishing sender reputation
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 像Gmail这样的邮件客户端有智能算法，知道你的邮件发送历史。当你犯了电子邮件营销的错误，他们会把你关进垃圾邮件监狱。要想出来，您需要建立良好的发件人声誉，而WarmupYourEmail可以帮助您做到这一点。
localize.tagline: 通过建立发件人的信誉，总是能落在收件箱中。

localize.description: 像Gmail這樣的郵件客戶端有智能算法，知道你的郵件發送歷史。當你犯了電子郵件營銷的錯誤，他們會把你關進垃圾郵件監獄。要想出來，您需要建立良好的發件人聲譽，而WarmupYourEmail可以幫助您做到這一點。
localize.tagline: 通過建立發件人的信譽，總是能落在收件箱中。

nodes.excerpt: Kaleidoscope 2.4 features a new powerful integration with the Xcode debugger. Send any debugger command (ksp) or object (kspo) output to Kaleidoscope. This enables iterating over common development tasks quickly.

nodes.excerpt: www.viviparty.com is a space for virtual events. Move freely from room to room and meet one-on-one or in groups. Design your own room, invite friends and set privacy. View a slideshow or play a game. Lots of fun features! Need your ideas and feedback!

nodes.author: John Moran

localize.description: www.viviparty.com 是一个虚拟活动的空间。在房间与房间之间自由移动，一对一或团体见面。设计您自己的房间，邀请朋友并设置隐私。观看幻灯片或玩游戏。很多有趣的功能! 需要你的想法和反馈!
localize.tagline: 让Zoom鸡尾酒会更上一层楼。

localize.description: www.viviparty.com 是一個虛擬活動的空間。在房間與房間之間自由移動，一對一或團體見面。設計您自己的房間，邀請朋友並設置隱私。觀看幻燈片或玩遊戲。很多有趣的功能! 需要你的想法和反饋!
localize.tagline: 讓Zoom雞尾酒會更上一層樓。

nodes.excerpt: Chrome Extension using the latest AI technology to analyze huge amount of text in milliseconds and auto highlights the most relevant sentences. All for you to save time on web research and not being distracted and overloaded by non-relevant information.
nodes.title: AI Chrome Web Highlight - Auto highlights the important sentences on websites with AI
nodes.author: Talaal Max Habib

localize.description: Chrome浏览器扩展使用最新的人工智能技术，在几毫秒内分析大量的文本，并自动突出最相关的句子。所有这些都为您节省了网络研究的时间，而不会被无关的信息所干扰和超载。
localize.tagline: 用AI自动突出网站上的重要句子。

localize.description: Chrome瀏覽器擴展使用最新的人工智能技術，在幾毫秒內分析大量的文本，並自動突出最相關的句子。所有這些都爲您節省了網絡研究的時間，而不會被無關的信息所幹擾和超載。
localize.tagline: 用AI自動突出網站上的重要句子。
